pageContent: Purpose: We investigated racial/ethnic differences in functional outcomes up to 5 years after diagnosis among men with aggressively treated localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Randomised, placebo-controlled, crossover trial of sildenafil citrate in the treatment of erectile dysfunction following external beam radiation treatment of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20598010/
